```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
dataplot <- function(x, bins = 50, colour = "blue") {
  ggplot(tibble(x = x), aes(x = x, y = after_stat(density))) +
    geom_histogram(bins = bins, colour = colour, fill = colour, alpha = 0.2) +
    geom_density(colour = colour, fill = colour, alpha = 0.2) +
    theme_bw()
}
```

```{r task 1}
set.seed(24205242)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(gridExtra)
library(MASS)
bank_data <- read_csv("data/banksurvey.csv")

summary(bank_data$income)
sd(bank_data$income)

dataplot(bank_data$income)

norm_fit <- fitdistr(bank_data$income, "normal")
norm_fit %>% tidy()
curve(dnorm(x,norm_fit$estimate[1], norm_fit$estimate[2]), from=25, to = 125)

exp_fit <- fitdistr(bank_data$income, "exponential")
exp_fit %>% tidy()

gamma_fit <- fitdistr(bank_data$income, "gamma")
gamma_fit %>% tidy()

```
